text: Ni munkolangagani Allah mâ€™mowa gakuwalanjika (gagali mowa gatatu panyuma pa lisiku lya idi ya mfungotatu), nambo jwachachelenje pa (gamba kutama) mowa gawilipe (ni kuwigulaga) chawe jwangali ulemwa, nombe jwachachelewele (pakumalisya mowa ganagatatu) chawe soni jwangali ulemwa, kwa mundu jwachawe ni woga, ni mun'jogopani Allah, soni manyililani yanti wanganyammwe Kukwakwe chinchisonganganyisyidwa
